#summary Building.

=== BUILDING MEDNAFFE ON LINUX ===

To build mednaffe you need gtk2 (2.18 or higher) 
or gtk3 (3.4 or higher) development libraries.

Run the ``configure'' script here, e.g.:
	./configure 

If you want to build gtk3 version:
	./configure --enable-gtk3

Then build with:
	make

To install it then do:
	make install

(Note: You do not need to install mednaffe, it can be run from /src folder.
Mednafen emulator must be in PATH)
